Human Summary: World's oldest known crocodile eggs laid some 15.2 crore years ago have been discovered in Portugal. The crocodile ancestor from the late Jurassic era is believed to be two metres long based on the size of the eggs. The eggs found during excavations of a dinosaur nest near Lisbon extends knowledge of eggs by four crore years, said a palaeontologist.
Model Predicted Summary: They are similar to the eggs of modern crocodiles, suggesting crocodile eggs have changed little in shape in the last 150 million years.The worlds oldest known crocodile eggs laid some 152 million years ago have been discovered in the cliffs of Portugal."The fact that they are from the Late Jurassic makes these eggs the oldest crocodilian eggs known so far," said Joao Russo of Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Portugal.

Human Summary: IT services major Infosys became the first India-registered company to be listed on NASDAQ on March 11, 1999. NASDAQ is the second-largest stock exchange in the world by market capitalisation.

Last time, Kohli got out for a duck in Tests was in August 2014 against England in Manchester.
